revised_title: The Velocity of Carbon Monoxide Displacing Oxygen from Hemoglobin
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to determine the velocity of the reaction between carbon monoxide and hemoglobin. They used a unique method to measure the reaction in the liquid phase, allowing them to calculate the reaction's velocity and better understand the physico-chemical behavior of hemoglobin. This research provides insight into the reaction kinetics and the role of hemoglobin in the body.
